title: Some Galaxy S21 FE owners report issues with laggy refresh rate
content:
The Galaxy S21 FE still sits in a bit of a weird spot given its retail pricing, but it’s a solid phone all around as we concluded in our review last month. However, some Galaxy S21 FE buyers have found since the phone’s launch that the display has a tendency to struggle with its refresh rate from time to time.

more…

The post Some Galaxy S21 FE owners report issues with laggy refresh rate appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A weird issue affecting some Galaxy S21 FE owners seems to cause the phone to dip below its 60Hz refresh rate, resulting in laggy performance
